page.title: 08Playground games at Lydden
page.content: At our school we play these two games. Go! == Someone stands in the middle of the playground and shouts "Go!"The idea is to"add"people before they get to the other side.The one who gets"had"first is "on it". Red Rover ========= You need 20 - 40 people to play this game.Half of the children go on one side of the playground.Somebody shouts "Red Rover".We call somebody from the other side over.The person from the opposing side has to run and try to get through your line.Everyone on your side joins hands.If you get through you go back to your own side but if not you join the other team.The winning team is the one which adds everyone from the other team to its own side.
